texts.previewContent:
The user asked about "how to improve work efficiency". I need to analyze this question from multiple angles:

First, I should consider the definition of work efficiency. Work efficiency usually refers to the amount and quality of work completed per unit of time. Improving work efficiency can be approached from the following aspects:

1. Time Management
- Use the Pomodoro Technique, breaking work into 25-minute focused sessions
- Create a priority list, handling important and urgent tasks first
- Avoid multitasking, focus on one thing at a time

2. Work Environment Optimization
- Keep the workspace clean and organized
- Reduce distractions, such as closing unnecessary notifications
- Ensure good lighting and comfortable seating

3. Skill Development
- Learn to use efficiency tools and software
- Improve professional skills to reduce time needed to complete tasks
- Develop good communication skills

4. Physical and Mental Health
- Ensure adequate sleep
- Exercise regularly to maintain physical health
- Learn to relax and reduce stress

I think this answer covers the main aspects of work efficiency, being both practical and comprehensive. Users should be able to find methods that suit them.
